section.p: The Uttakin soldiers include three of the Soulwatch, the secret police. They are remorseless in their pursuit of fugitives. You are wanted for renouncing the worship of Ebron, a foul crime in the eyes of the fanatic Uttakin.
'Get the infidel heretic!' cries one of the Soulwatch.
